Name: Break the Web
About the game: Break the Web Break the Web is a 3D first-person shooter game made in the unusual surreal style of 90s shooters. Immerse yourself in an unforgettable adventure among palm trees and the endless ocean in the world of the Internet. Hospitable dolphins, antique statues and mysterious enemies await you. This world is in danger and is slowly dying, take courage, grab a katana and try to save this world. Features: -Surreal world with its mystery -Old doom-like style of play -Various weapons -And so on...
